name: HP 16-as0013dx
specs: OmniBook X Flip 2 - in - 1  -  Copilot+ PC  -  16" 2K Touch - Screen Laptop  -  Intel Core Ultra 5  -  16GB Memory  -  512GB SSD  -  Eclipse Gray

full_specs.Product Name: OmniBook X Flip 2-in-1 - Copilot+ PC - 16" 2K Touch-Screen Laptop - Intel Core Ultra 5 - 16GB Memory - 512GB SSD

all_reviews.title: Love it!!!
all_reviews.body: I love it! The 16” is the perfect size, I’m using it as a tablet, super convenient! Easy to use as well! No regrets!

all_reviews.title: Upgrade was a surprise
all_reviews.body: I am replacing my old hp laptop with this Omni book. I love that it isn’t much larger in overall size but that the screen goes from one edge to the other. The touch screen, backlit keyboard and flip properties are nice luxuries.

all_reviews.title: So far great
all_reviews.body: So far it's great. It responds to touch well. It folds clean and all the way to the back, so I can use it as a tablet. Fast, great graphics, and battery seems to do well. Will repost back if that changes.

all_reviews.title: Excellent Value
all_reviews.body: Excellent value.  Especially at the sale or open box price.  The screen is bright and clear and the keyboard is laid out well.   No or problems so far in the short time I have had it.

all_reviews.title: Great buy
all_reviews.body: Just perfect for my grandson to use at the trade school he will be attending in the fall. It was beyond the minimum requirements that he needed and should be perfect for his studies

all_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop!
all_reviews.body: Great purchase. Super fast and smooth and great screen and battery life. Love that it flips into a tablet too. Perfect for school, work, or just chilling. Definitely worth it!

all_reviews.title: Great for the $$
all_reviews.body: Easy to set up. Built solid with better materials than the less expensive pc’s. Great processor speed and memory.

all_reviews.title: Excellent laptop
all_reviews.body: I love my new laptop!  It was easy to set up and runs smoothly.  Excellent quality!  This has been such a great  purchase.  I use it for personal and for business.

all_reviews.title: Love my HP!
all_reviews.body: Excellent service experience to start. Bought this laptop with a great sale as well. Love love this lap ! Super powerful and great special features.

all_reviews.title: HP laptop
all_reviews.body:
the laptop is very easy to use
The Geek Squad transferred all my files and set up my apps

all_reviews.title: HP Omnibook X works well.
all_reviews.body: The laptop is excellent.  I had the Geek Squad set it up and have had no problems wit it.

all_reviews.title: Great purchase.
all_reviews.body: Lots of great features.  Been using it about a month now and very happy with it.

all_reviews.title: Great Value
all_reviews.body: I would recommend this laptop for personal or business use. Great value!

all_reviews.title: laptop computer'
all_reviews.body:
love this computer.. best buy has the best customer service 
thank you

all_reviews.title: HP Laptop
all_reviews.body: omniBookLove the new HP OmniBook touchscreen.  The vibrant colors are awesome

all_reviews.title: Laptop
all_reviews.body: Amazing laptop for work, love the keyboard and all of the features!

all_reviews.title: Still Learning
all_reviews.body: So far, good.  Going from an old laptop to a new, updated model takes some patience and work.  I hate to give it a rating, because I’m still getting used to where things are.  That’s the only reason I’ve given it good instead of excellent.

all_reviews.title: Great Product
all_reviews.body: Great price and perfect for my daughter headed to college

all_reviews.title: New computer
all_reviews.body: Computer working well -great pictures-easy to use.

all_reviews.title: New CPT purchaased
all_reviews.body: very happy with recent purchase, everything I needed.

all_reviews.title: Happy Camper
all_reviews.body: So far this is a lot easier than the MacBook. Still learning but I give it a thumbs up. Sleek-Fast-On Point.

all_reviews.title: easy
all_reviews.body: easy to use and set up had step by step directions on set up
